channel.title: Updates on Rootwork.org
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Rootwork.org

item.title: Farewell: You've been unsubscribed from email updates
item.description: I’ve removed your email address from the Rootwork.org email updates list, per your request. No hard feelings! If you have a moment, please reach out on social media and let me know why you decided to go.

item.title: Thanks for subscribing to Rootwork.org email updates!
item.description: Please check your email now for a confirmation message. To ensure all your updates get delivered, I suggest adding updates@mail.rootwork.org to your contacts or address book.
